title: Redemption's Run
description: Twelve-year-old Kacie Aldrich has never known her father, but sketches him as a pirate, a reflection of her mother’s stories. When a mysterious young captain arrives in her hometown of Bayfield, Wisconsin, Kacie believes she has found her pirate and stows aboard Jack McKinney’s boat, Redemption, searching for answers. Her desperate actions drive them into the heart of a storm to confront old ghosts, long-buried secrets and the wrath of Lake Superior. “Redemption’s Run” is a heartfelt tale of how family can run beyond blood, and redemption can come in unexpected ways.
author: Jane Fredericksen
